references: A. Cayley, On the Porism of the In-and-circumscribed Polygon, Collected Mathematical Papers. Vols. 1-13, Cambridge Univ. Press, London, 1889-1897, Vol. 4, 292-308 (see p. 300).
mathematica: nmax = 30; aa = ConstantArray[0,nmax]; aa[[1]] = 1; aa[[2]] = -1; aa[[3]] = 1; Do[aa[[n]] = Sum[aa[[k]] * aa[[n-k]],{k,1,n-1}],{n,4,nmax}]; aa (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 25 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
